entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
